subject: Sexual Health
title: The Refractory Period
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Refractory Period.

hook.text: After orgasm, most men enter a refractory period where further arousal is temporarily impossible.

buildup.text: Prolactin surges after orgasm, suppressing dopamine and shutting down the arousal system briefly.

discovery.text: The refractory period lasts minutes in young men but can extend to hours or days with age.

twist.text: Most women do not have a refractory period, which is why multiple orgasms are physiologically possible for them.

climax.text: The refractory period is a neurochemical event, not a choice. Understanding it reduces performance pressure.

punchline.text: Prolactin says stop. The brain must comply. Temporarily.

quiz.question: What hormone causes the male refractory period?
